channel.title: Attacking other people!?!
channel.description: Say i want people to not be able to attack the owner, how would i do that? That is hypothetical, i am really trying to say if the other person is on your team how would u do it? I just need a way to check if the person u r clicking attack on is on ur team. The team code is... [code]String team = "";[/code] You are either on Zamorak or Saradomin. Whichever u pick u are, that all works. I just need to know how to see if the other person is on your team u can't attack. I know how to make it check your own team, so i know how to compare if they are on your team, i just don't know how to make it check theirs, i only know how to make it check yours. Please HELP!
